price: ফিৰআউনে ক’লে, ‘যদি তুমি সত্যবাদী হোৱা তেন্তে সেয়া লৈ আহা’।
arabic: قَالَ فَأۡتِ بِهِۦٓ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla fati bihi in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
